Registry of Open Data on AWS

U.S. Census ACS PUMS

census statistics survey sustainability

Description

U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey (ACS) Public Use Microdata Sample (PUMS) available in a linked data format using the Resource Description Framework (RDF) data model.

Update Frequency

Yearly, after ACS 1-year PUMS raw data are released

License

Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)

Documentation

https://docs.data.world/uscensus/#american-community-survey-linked-open-data

Contact

https://docs.data.world/uscensus/#60---contact

Usage Examples

Tutorials
  • Setting up Blazegraph on EC2 by data.world

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    PUMS data in Turtle - Terse RDF Triple Language (.ttl) format along with ontologies and other complementary data.
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::dataworld-linked-acs
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://dataworld-linked-acs/ --no-sign-request
